resources.string: "\t" As there is a lack of data-sets for vitriculture ( as opposed to other fields in priecision farming ), This project is a tool to collect annotated images of grapevines that will help us come up with better algortihms for pruning which requires a deep expertise that is hard to encode.
"\t" The data that will be gathered from this application can be used to help building expert systems,machine learning models,or frameworks for grapevine prunings
